title: “This Didn't End the Way It’s Supposed to End.” (Bonus)
description: The N.B.A. superstar Chris Bosh was still competing at the highest level when a blood clot abruptly ended his career. In his new book, Letters to a Young Athlete, Bosh covers the highlights and the struggles. In this installment of the Freakonomics Radio Book Club, he talks with guest host Angela Duckworth.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
